GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v4.14.289
GSD.description:
xen/netback: avoid entering xenvif_rx_next_skb() with an empty rx queue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.289 by commit d5320c6a27aa975aff740f9cb481dcbde48f4348, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit 98f6d57ced73b723551568262019f1d6c8771f20. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: xen/netback: avoid entering xenvif_rx_next_skb() with an empty rx queue
OSV.details:
